summary: Study revision tracker with manual review marking system

existing_features.title: When a user marks a revision as reviewed, change its visual indicator to green and update the backend state to persist this completion status
Add mark as reviewed functionality in the calendar view for revision sessions displayed on selected dates
Ensure mark as reviewed functionality is available in the topics section for all displayed revision schedules
Display a count or indicator showing how many times each topic has been reviewed (completed revisions)

new_feature_requests.summary: Manual revision tracking: topics marked red until reviewed, turn green when marked complete, available in calendar and topics views
Keep all scheduled revision sessions marked in red (using existing missed revision styling) until the user manually marks them as reviewed

projectName: Refine manual revision marking with persistent red/green status indicators
